data.text:
Moody Foodie

Bob frets that his customers will stay away when his restaurant receives a terrible review from a malicious critic. However, his plan to confront the critic at home spirals out of control when other disgruntled restaurant owners turn up to lend their support.

Family Business

A criminal from Danny's past kidnaps Jackie, Jamie meets his new partner and an officer accidentally shoots an innocent man.

12:00 P.M. - 1:00 P.M.

Bauer finds a video in the card showing Tokarev's involvement. He sends Tokarev's photo to Ricker, who identifies him and promises to help Bauer capture him. Bauer calls Reed and offers the evidence, arranging a meeting at a store.

10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.

President Taylor presses on with the peace agreement, and Jack calls in a favour before embarking on a crucial mission. Michael Madsen guest stars.
